wines.name: Barolo DOCG 2018
wines.notes: Elegant and structured, notes of rose and tar
wines.description: A Barolo of great elegance and structure from one of Piedmont's most historic wineries. This wine showcases the traditional style of Giacomo Conterno with its powerful tannins, complex aromatics, and extraordinary aging potential.
wines.production_notes: Traditional fermentation in oak vats, aged 30 months in large Slavonian oak casks
wines.sommelier_notes: Our sommelier's top pick for special occasions. Perfect with our signature brasato al Barolo.

wines.name: Pinot Grigio DOC 2022
wines.notes: Fresh and mineral, perfect with seafood
wines.description: High-quality Pinot Grigio from Alto Adige with bright acidity and mineral notes. This wine represents the best of mountain viticulture with its clean, precise flavors and elegant structure.
wines.production_notes: Fermented in stainless steel, brief skin contact for color
wines.sommelier_notes: Excellent aperitif wine and perfect match for our seafood appetizers.

wines.name: Chianti Classico DOCG 2020
wines.description: Classic Chianti from one of Tuscany's most historic estates. The Ricasoli family has been making wine here since 1141, and their expertise shows in this beautifully balanced expression of Sangiovese.
wines.production_notes: Aged 12 months in French oak barrels
wines.sommelier_notes: Currently unavailable - we're sourcing the 2021 vintage. A perfect match for our Tuscan-inspired dishes.
